explains: adj. 修正过的，经过修改的
v. 改变，修正；修改，修订（书刊、估算等）；<英>温习，复习（revise 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: I'll prepare a revised estimate for you.
sentences.cn: 我将为你准备一份经过修正的评估报告。

sentences.en: The death toll was initially reported at around 250, but was later revised to 300.
sentences.cn: 最初报道死亡人数约250，后修订为300。

sentences.en: We will always confirm the revised amount to you in writing before debiting your account.
sentences.cn: 在记入你的借方账户前，我们每次都会以书面形式向你确认修改过的数额。
